properties.Replacement Value:
INSERT INTO tco_masterdata_section_2(
	host,
	identifier,
	des,
	wc,
	"group",
	plant,
	counter,
	"timestamp"
) 
VALUES (
	'${transmitter}',
	'${identifier}',
	'${des:replace("'", '')}',
	'${wc}',
	'${group}',
	'${plant}',
	'${counter}',
	'${timestamp}'
)
ON CONFLICT("group", plant, host, identifier)
DO UPDATE SET 
	wc = '${wc}',
	counter='${counter}',
	"timestamp"='${timestamp}',
	des='${des:replace("'", '')}'
WHERE tco_masterdata_section_2.counter < '${counter}'

INSERT INTO tco_masterdata_workstation_2(
	"host",
	plant,
	"group",
	"timestamp",
	identifier,
	des,
	typ,
	"prl",
	"counter"
) 
VALUES ( 
	'${transmitter}',
	'${plant}',
	'${group}',
	'${timestamp}',
	'${identifier}',
	'${des:replace("'", '')}',
	'${typ}',
	'${prl}',
	'${counter}'
)
ON CONFLICT(plant, "group", host, identifier)
DO UPDATE SET
	timestamp='${timestamp}',
	des='${des:replace("'", '')}',
	typ='${typ}',
	prl='${prl}',
	counter='${counter}'
WHERE tco_masterdata_workstation_2.counter < '${counter}'

UPDATE tco_plant
SET is_active = TRUE 
WHERE plant_code = '${plant}' and
bg_name = '${group}' and
is_active = FALSE;

INSERT INTO tco_masterdata_operation_2(host,"type",nr,subs,sec,identifier,counter,"timestamp",des,plant,"group") 
VALUES ('${transmitter}','${type}','${nr}','${subs}','${sec}','${identifier}','${counter}','${timestamp}','${des:replace("'", '')}','${plant}','${group}')
ON CONFLICT(plant, "group", host, identifier)
DO UPDATE SET 
	"type" = '${type}',
	nr = '${nr}',
	subs='${subs}',
	sec='${sec}',
	counter='${counter}',
	"timestamp"='${timestamp}',
	des='${des:replace("'", '')}'
WHERE tco_masterdata_operation_2.counter < '${counter}'

INSERT INTO tco_masterdata_workstation_parameters (
  "bg_name",
  plant,
  "host",
  "workstation",
  "parameter_type",
  "parameter_rank",
  "parameter_name",
  "application_date",
  "parameter_unit",
  "tran_timestamp",
  "parameter_desc"
) 
VALUES (
  '${group}',
  '${plant}',
  '${transmitter}',
  '${identifier}',
  '${name}',
  '${rank}',
  '${attribute}',
  '${date_c}',
  '${parameter_unit}',
  '${timestamp}',
  '${des}'
)
ON CONFLICT(plant, "bg_name", host, identifier) 
DO UPDATE SET "parameter_rank" = COALESCE(EXCLUDED."parameter_rank", 1);

INSERT INTO tco_masterdata_rework_2(
	"host",
	"plant",
	"group",
	"timestamp",
	"des",
	"code",
	"counter"
) 
VALUES (
	'${transmitter}',
	'${plant}',
	'${group}',
	'${timestamp}',
	'${des}',
	'${code}',
	'${counter}'
)
ON CONFLICT("group", plant, host, code)
DO UPDATE SET 
	timestamp='${timestamp}',
	counter='${counter}',
	des='${des:replace("'", '')}'
WHERE tco_masterdata_rework_2.counter < '${counter}'

INSERT INTO tco_masterdata_scrap_2(
	"host",
	"plant",
	"group",
	"timestamp",
	"des",
	"code",
	"counter"
) 
VALUES (
	'${transmitter}',
	'${plant}',
	'${group}',
	'${timestamp}',
	'${des}',

	'${counter}'
)

DO UPDATE SET

	des='${des:replace("'", '')}'
WHERE tco_masterdata_scrap_2.counter < '${counter}'

VALUES ('${transmitter}','${counter}','${timestamp}','${uap}','${des:replace("'", '')}','${plant}','${group}')

	counter='${counter}',
	"timestamp"='${timestamp}'

	'${plant}',
	'${group}',
	'${code}',

	counter='${counter}',

	surn='${surn:replace("'", '')}'
WHERE tco_masterdata_operator_2.counter < '${counter}'

	'${timestamp}',
	'${ref}',
	'${grp}',
	'${sec}',
	'${des:replace("'", '')}',

DO UPDATE SET 
	"fam"='${fam}',
	"typ"='${typ}',
	"timestamp"='${timestamp}',
	"grp"='${grp}',
	"sec"='${sec}',
	"des"='${des:replace("'", '')}',

destination.name: Storage of the original host sender

source.name: Storage of the original host sender

properties.SQL select query:
SELECT 
  plant_code,
  CAST('${date_c}' AS TIMESTAMP) as timestamp_o
FROM 
  tco_plant
WHERE 
  plant_code = '${Plant}'
  AND CONCAT('tco_parts_', '${Plant}', '_', TO_CHAR('${date_c}'::TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMM')) NOT IN (SELECT tablename FROM pg_catalog.pg_tables);

SELECT plant_code 
FROM tco_plant
WHERE plant_code = '${Plant}'
  AND 'tco_parts_' || '${Plant}'
  	NOT IN (SELECT tablename FROM pg_catalog.pg_tables where tablename like 'tco_parts%')

	host,

  "bg_name",
  plant,
  "host",
  "workstation",
  "parameter_type",
  "parameter_rank",
  "parameter_name",
  "application_date",
  "parameter_unit",
  "tran_timestamp",
  "parameter_desc"
) 
VALUES (
  '${group}',
  '${plant}',
  '${transmitter}',
  '${identifier}',
  '${name}',
  '${rank:contains(''):ifElse('1',${rank})}',
  '${attribute}',
  '${date}',
  '${parameter_unit}',
  '${timestamp}',
  '${des}'
)
ON CONFLICT(plant, "bg_name", host, identifier) 
DO UPDATE SET "parameter_rank" = COALESCE(EXCLUDED."parameter_rank", 1);

	"type" = '${type}',

	sec='${sec}',
	counter='${counter}',
	"timestamp"='${timestamp}',
	des='${des:replace("'", '')}'

	counter='${counter}',
	"timestamp"='${timestamp}'
WHERE tco_masterdata_line_2.counter < '${counter}'

INSERT INTO tco_masterdata_operator_2(
	"host",
	"timestamp",
	"counter",
	"plant",
	"group",
	"code",
	"name",
	"surn"
) 
VALUES (
	'${transmitter}',
	'${timestamp}',
	'${counter}',
	'${plant}',
	'${group}',
	'${code}',
	'${name}',
	'${surn:replace("'", '')}'
)
ON CONFLICT(plant, "group", host, code)
DO UPDATE SET 
	timestamp='${timestamp}',
	counter='${counter}',
	name='${name}',
	surn='${surn:replace("'", '')}'
WHERE tco_masterdata_operator_2.counter < '${counter}'

INSERT INTO tco_masterdata_part_2(
	"host",
	"plant",
	"group",
	"fam",
	"typ",
	"timestamp",
	"ref",
	"grp",
	"sec",
	"des",
	"counter") 
VALUES ( 
	'${transmitter}',
	'${plant}',
	'${group}',
	'${fam}',
	'${typ}',
	'${timestamp}',
	'${ref}',
	'${grp}',
	'${sec}',
	'${des:replace("'", '')}',
	'${counter}'
)
ON CONFLICT("group", plant, host, ref)
DO UPDATE SET 
	"fam"='${fam}',
	"typ"='${typ}',
	"timestamp"='${timestamp}',
	"grp"='${grp}',
	"sec"='${sec}',
	"des"='${des:replace("'", '')}',
	"counter"='${counter}'
WHERE tco_masterdata_part_2.counter < '${counter}'

properties.SQL select query:
SELECT plant_code 
FROM tco_plant
WHERE plant_code = '${Plant}'
  AND 'tco_parts_' || '${Plant}'
  	NOT IN (SELECT tablename FROM pg_catalog.pg_tables where tablename like 'tco_parts%')

SELECT 
  plant_code,
  CAST('${date_c}' AS TIMESTAMP) as timestamp_o
FROM 
  tco_plant
WHERE 
  plant_code = '${Plant}'
  AND CONCAT('tco_parts_', '${Plant}', '_', TO_CHAR('${date_c}'::TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMM')) NOT IN (SELECT tablename FROM pg_catalog.pg_tables);

processGroups.name: Partition management for Active Plants
processGroups.comments:
Create all active partition Plants in advance
Remove empty partitions

properties.SQL select query:
DO $$ 
DECLARE
    table_schema text;
    table_name text;
BEGIN
    FOR table_schema, table_name IN 
        SELECT n.nspname, c.relname
        FROM pg_class c
        JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
        WHERE c.relkind = 'r'
            AND n.nspname NOT IN ('information_schema', 'pg_catalog')
            AND c.reltuples = 0
            AND (
                (c.relname LIKE 'tco_batch_%')
                AND NOT (
                    c.relname LIKE '%' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMM') OR
                    c.relname LIKE '%' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 month', 'YYYYMM')
                )
            )
            AND c.relname NOT IN ('tco_parts_tcoparms', 'tco_parts_tcodata', 'tco_batch_list')
    LOOP
        EXECUTE 'DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ' || table_schema || '.' || table_name || ' CASCADE';
    END LOOP;
END $$;

properties.Replacement Value: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.tco_comp_${plant:toLower()}_${date:substring(0,7):replace('-', '')} PARTITION OF public.tco_comp_${plant:toLower()} FOR VALUES FROM ('${date:substring(0,7)}-01 00:00:00+00') TO ('${date:substring(0,7):append("-01"):toDate("yyyy-MM-dd"):toNumber():plus(2678400000):format("yyyy-MM")}-01 00:00:00+00');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.tco_parts_${plant:toLower()}_${timestamp:substring(0,7):replace('-', '')} PARTITION OF public.tco_parts_${plant:toLower()} FOR VALUES FROM ('${timestamp:substring(0,7)}-01 00:00:00+00') TO ('${timestamp:substring(0,7):append("-01"):toDate("yyyy-MM-dd"):toNumber():plus(2678400000):format("yyyy-MM")}-01 00:00:00+00');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.tco_batch_${plant:toLower()}_${timestamp:substring(0,7):replace('-', '')} PARTITION OF public.tco_batch_${plant:toLower()} FOR VALUES FROM ('${timestamp:substring(0,7)}-01 00:00:00+00') TO ('${timestamp:substring(0,7):append("-01"):toDate("yyyy-MM-dd"):toNumber():plus(2678400000):format("yyyy-MM")}-01 00:00:00+00');
adls,group=${group},plant=${plant},file_type=${file_type} nb_file=1

INSERT INTO tco_parts(
	"id",
	"counter",
	"isprd",
	"isdeg",
	"isok",
	"identifier",
	"ws",
	"oper",
	"cyt",
	"prt",
	"timestamp",
	"date",
	"ref",
	"plant",
	"group",
	"item",
	"data",
	"host",
	"is_updated",
	"op_code",
	"parameter",
	"equipmentid"
) 
VALUES ( 
	'${group}-${plant}-${item}-${date}',
	'${counter}',
	'${isprd}',
	'${isdeg}',
	'${isok}',
	'${identifier}',
	'${ws}',
	'${oper}',
	'${cyt}',
	'${prt}',
	'${date:replaceAll('([0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2})(\:|\.)([0-9]{3})', '$1.$3')}',
	'${timestamp:replaceAll('([0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2})(\:|\.)([0-9]{3})', '$1.$3')}',
	'${ref}',
	'${plant}',
	'${group}',
	'${item}',
	'${data:replace("'",'')}',
	'${transmitter}',
	'TRUE',
	'${op_code}',
	'${parameter}',
	'${equipmentid:replace("'",'')}'
) 
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

)

	'${dn_t}',

	'${isok}',
	'${identifier}',
	'${ws}',

	'${timestamp:replaceAll('([0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2})(\:|\.)([0-9]{3})', '$1.$3')}',

tco_delivery_tco_part(
	delivery_id,

processors.name: Replace Item Id for Complete Seat

properties.Replacement Value:
INSERT INTO tco_delivery(
  delivery_id,
  hu_code,
  hu_type,
  status,
  hu_mother,
  part_code,
  quantity,
  capacity,
  unit,
  customer_code,
  delivery_note_id,
  shipping_date,
  plant_code, 
  bg_name) 
VALUES (
  '${plant}-${identifier}',
  '${identifier}',
  'P',
  'PRODUCED',
  '---',
  '${ref}',
  '${qty}',
  '${cty}',
  'PCE',
  '${dst}',
  '---',
  '${date}',
  '${plant}',
  '${bg_name}') 
ON CONFLICT(bg_name, plant_code, hu_code) DO NOTHING;

INSERT INTO tco_items_replace(bg_name, plant, host, item_replaced, item_new, "timestamp") VALUES ('${bg_name}', '${plant}', '${host}', '${item_replaced}', '${item_new}', '${timestamp}') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING ;
UPDATE tco_items_replace SET is_active = False, tran_timestamp = current_timestamp WHERE bg_name = '${bg_name}' AND plant = '${plant}' AND host = '${host}' AND item_new = '${item_new}' AND item_replaced <> '${item_replaced}' AND is_active = true ;

INSERT INTO tco_items(
	"bg_name",
	"plant",
	"host",
	"item"
) 
VALUES ( 
	'${group}',
	'${plant}',
	'${transmitter}',
	'${item}'
) 
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

INSERT INTO tco_comp(
	id,
	parent,
	bc,
	ref,
	isml,
	plant,
	"group",
	item,
	"timestamp",
	host
) 
VALUES ( 
	'${group}-${plant}-${item}-${date}-${bc:replace(' ',''):replace(':',''):replace("'",'')}',
	'${group}-${plant}-${item}-${date:replaceAll('([0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2})(\:|\.)([0-9]{3})', '$1.$3')}',
	'${bc:replace("'",'')}',
	'${ref}',
	'${isml}',
	'${plant}',
	'${group}',
	'${item}',
	'${date}',
	'${transmitter}'
	
) 
ON CONFLICT (id, plant, "timestamp") 
DO UPDATE SET qty = tco_comp.qty + 1 
WHERE date_part('minute', current_timestamp - tco_comp.tran_timestamp) < 4

properties.Replacement Value: INSERT INTO tco_delivery_part(part_code,part_description,plant_code,customer_ref, bg_name) VALUES ('${PARTS}','${PARTS_DESC}','${PLANT}','${CUST_MAT}','${GROUP}') ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT pk_tco_delivery_part DO NOTHING;

INSERT INTO tco_delivery(delivery_id,hu_code,hu_type,status,hu_mother,part_code,quantity,capacity,unit,customer_code,delivery_note_id,shipping_date,date_from_api,date_to_api,plant_code, bg_name) VALUES ('${id}','${HU_CODE}','${TYPE}','${STATUS}','${MOTHER_HU}','${PARTS}','${QTY}','${QTY}','${UNIT}','${CUSTOMER}','${OUTBOUNDDELIVERY}',${EXP_DEL_DATE:equals('---'):not():and(${EXP_DEL_TIME:equals('---'):not()}):ifElse("'${EXP_DEL_DATE}T${EXP_DEL_TIME}'","'${DATE_TO}'")},'${DATE_FROM}','${DATE_TO}','${PLANT}','${GROUP}') ON CONFLICT(bg_name, plant_code, hu_code) DO UPDATE SET status = '${STATUS}', hu_type='${TYPE}', customer_code='${CUSTOMER}', delivery_note_id='${OUTBOUNDDELIVERY}', shipping_date=${EXP_DEL_DATE:equals('---'):not():and(${EXP_DEL_TIME:equals('---'):not()}):ifElse("'${EXP_DEL_DATE}T${EXP_DEL_TIME}'","'${DATE_TO}'")} WHERE tco_delivery.status <> '${STATUS}';
